alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 8:19PM CST until December 15 at 11:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR CENTRAL WABASHA AND NORTHERN BUFFALO COUNTIES... At 818 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Wabasha, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Emergency management confirmed tornado near Eyota. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Modena around 825 PM CST. Mondovi around 835 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Nelson, Pioneer Campground, Maxville, Zumbro Bottoms Campground, Mondovi Airfield, Conception and Misha Mokwa. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
